00043 void IOHandler::add_poll_interest(int mode) {
00044   m_poll_interest |= mode;
00045 }

00049 void IOHandler::remove_poll_interest(int mode) {
00050   m_poll_interest &= ~mode;

00055 void IOHandler::display_event(struct epoll_event *event) {
00056   char buf[128];
00057 
00058   buf[0] = 0;
00059   if (event->events & EPOLLIN)
00060     strcat(buf, "EPOLLIN ");
00061   else if (event->events & EPOLLOUT)
00062     strcat(buf, "EPOLLOUT ");
00063   else if (event->events & EPOLLPRI)
00064     strcat(buf, "EPOLLPRI ");
00065   else if (event->events & EPOLLERR)
00066     strcat(buf, "EPOLLERR ");
00067   else if (event->events & EPOLLHUP)
00068     strcat(buf, "EPOLLHUP ");
00069   else if (event->events & EPOLLET)
00070     strcat(buf, "EPOLLET ");
00071   else if (event->events & EPOLLONESHOT)
00072     strcat(buf, "EPOLLONESHOT ");
00073 
00074   if (buf[0] == 0)
00075     sprintf(buf, "0x%x ", event->events);
00076 
00077   clog << "epoll events = " << buf << endl;
00078 
00079   return;
00080 }

00086 void IOHandler::add_poll_interest(int mode) {
00087   struct kevent events[2];
00088   int count=0;
00089   if (mode & Reactor::READ_READY) {
00090     EV_SET(&events[count], m_sd, EVFILT_READ, EV_ADD | EV_ENABLE, 0, 0, this);
00091     count++;
00092   }
00093   if (mode & Reactor::WRITE_READY) {
00094     EV_SET(&events[count], m_sd, EVFILT_WRITE, EV_ADD | EV_ENABLE, 0, 0, this);
00095     count++;
00096   }
00097   assert(count > 0);
00098 
00099   if (kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kqd, events, count, 0, 0, 0) == -1) {
00100     HT_ERRORF("kevent(sd=%d) (mode=%x) : %s", m_sd, mode, strerror(errno));
00101     exit(1);
00102   }
00103   m_poll_interest |= mode;
00104 }
00105 
00106 void IOHandler::remove_poll_interest(int mode) {
00107   struct kevent devents[2];
00108   int count = 0;
00109 
00110   if (mode & Reactor::READ_READY) {
00111     EV_SET(&devents[count], m_sd, EVFILT_READ, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00112     count++;
00113   }
00114 
00115   if (mode & Reactor::WRITE_READY) {
00116     EV_SET(&devents[count], m_sd, EVFILT_WRITE, EV_DELETE, 0, 0, 0);
00117     count++;
00118   }
00119 
00120   if (kevent(m_reactor_ptr->kqd, devents, count, 0, 0, 0) == -1 && errno != ENOENT) {
00121     HT_ERRORF("kevent(sd=%d) (mode=%x) : %s", m_sd, mode, strerror(errno));
00122     exit(1);
00123   }
00124 }

00130 void IOHandler::display_event(struct kevent *event) {
00131 
00132   clog << "kevent: ident=" << hex << (long)event->ident;
00133 
00134   switch (event->filter) {
00135   case EVFILT_READ:
00136     clog << ", EVFILT_READ, fflags=";
00137     if (event->fflags & NOTE_LOWAT)
00138       clog << "NOTE_LOWAT";
00139     else
00140       clog << event->fflags;
00141     break;
00142   case EVFILT_WRITE:
00143     clog << ", EVFILT_WRITE, fflags=";
00144     if (event->fflags & NOTE_LOWAT)
00145       clog << "NOTE_LOWAT";
00146     else
00147       clog << event->fflags;
00148     break;
00149   case EVFILT_AIO:
00150     clog << ", EVFILT_AIO, fflags=" << event->fflags;
00151     break;
00152   case EVFILT_VNODE:
00153     clog << ", EVFILT_VNODE, fflags={";
00154     if (event->fflags & NOTE_DELETE)
00155       clog << " NOTE_DELETE";
00156     if (event->fflags & NOTE_WRITE)
00157       clog << " NOTE_WRITE";
00158     if (event->fflags & NOTE_EXTEND)
00159       clog << " NOTE_EXTEND";
00160     if (event->fflags & NOTE_ATTRIB)
00161       clog << " NOTE_ATTRIB";
00162     if (event->fflags & NOTE_LINK)
00163       clog << " NOTE_LINK";
00164     if (event->fflags & NOTE_RENAME)
00165       clog << " NOTE_RENAME";
00166     if (event->fflags & NOTE_REVOKE)
00167       clog << " NOTE_REVOKE";
00168     clog << " }";
00169     break;
00170   case EVFILT_PROC:
00171     clog << ", EVFILT_VNODE, fflags={";
00172     if (event->fflags & NOTE_EXIT)
00173       clog << " NOTE_EXIT";
00174     if (event->fflags & NOTE_FORK)
00175       clog << " NOTE_FORK";
00176     if (event->fflags & NOTE_EXEC)
00177       clog << " NOTE_EXEC";
00178     if (event->fflags & NOTE_TRACK)
00179       clog << " NOTE_TRACK";
00180     if (event->fflags & NOTE_TRACKERR)
00181       clog << " NOTE_TRACKERR";
00182     if (event->fflags & NOTE_CHILD)
00183       clog << " NOTE_CHILD";
00184     clog << " pid=" << (event->flags & NOTE_PDATAMASK);
00185     break;
00186   case EVFILT_SIGNAL:
00187     clog << ", EVFILT_SIGNAL, fflags=" << event->fflags;
00188     break;
00189   case EVFILT_TIMER:
00190     clog << ", EVFILT_TIMER, fflags={";
00191     if (event->fflags & NOTE_SECONDS)
00192       clog << " NOTE_SECONDS";
00193     if (event->fflags & NOTE_USECONDS)
00194       clog << " NOTE_USECONDS";
00195     if (event->fflags & NOTE_NSECONDS)
00196       clog << " NOTE_NSECONDS";
00197     if (event->fflags & NOTE_ABSOLUTE)
00198       clog << " NOTE_ABSOLUTE";
00199     clog << " }";
00200     break;
00201   }
00202 
00203   if(event->flags != 0) {
00204     clog << ", flags=";
00205     if ((event->flags & EV_EOF) || (event->flags & EV_ERROR)) {
00206       clog << "{";
00207       if (event->flags & EV_EOF)
00208         clog << " EV_EOF";
00209       if (event->flags & EV_ERROR)
00210         clog << " EV_ERROR";
00211       clog << "}";
00212     }
00213     else
00214       clog << hex << event->flags;
00215   }
00216   clog << ", data=" << dec << (long)event->data << endl;
00217 }
